00014 #ifndef PROPERTYHELPER_H
00015 #define PROPERTYHELPER_H
00016 
00017 #include "MC2String.h"
00018 #include "Properties.h"
00019 #include "StringConvert.h"
00020 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00021 
00023 class PropertyException: public std::exception {
00024 public:
00025    explicit PropertyException( const MC2String& str) throw():
00026       m_str( str ) { }
00027    ~PropertyException() throw() { }
00028    const char* what() const throw() { return m_str.c_str(); }
00029 private:
00030    MC2String m_str;
00031 };
00032 
00037 namespace PropertyHelper {
00038 
00044 class PropertyInit { 
00045 public:
00046    PropertyInit() { }
00047    ~PropertyInit() {
00048       Properties::Destroy();
00049    }
00050 };
00051 
00059 template <typename T>
00060 T getFromString( const char* str ) throw (PropertyException);
00061 
00067 template <typename T>   
00068 T get( const char *propStr ) throw (PropertyException) try { 
00069 
00070    const char *str = Properties::getProperty( propStr );
00071    if ( str == NULL ) {
00072       throw PropertyException("Could not find property. ");
00073    }
00074 
00075    return StringConvert::convert<T>( str );
00076 
00077 } catch ( PropertyException str ) {
00078    throw PropertyException( MC2String( str.what() ) + 
00079                             " Property: " + ( propStr ? propStr : "" ));
00080 
00081 } catch ( const StringConvert::ConvertException& e ) {
00082    throw PropertyException( MC2String( e.what() ) +
00083                             " Property: " + ( propStr ? propStr : "" ) );
00084 }
00085 
00090 template<typename T>
00091 T get( const MC2String& propStr, T defaultValue );
00092 
00107 template<typename T>
00108 T getMostSpecializedProperty( const MC2String& propertyName,
00109                               const MC2String& modulePrefix,
00110                               uint32 mapSet,
00111                               T defaultValue ) {
00112    MC2String prefix = modulePrefix + "_";
00113    MC2String suffix = MC2String("_") + boost::lexical_cast<MC2String>( mapSet );
00114 
00115    T result = get( propertyName, defaultValue );
00116    result   = get( propertyName + suffix, result );
00117    result   = get( prefix + propertyName, result );
00118    result   = get( prefix + propertyName + suffix, result );
00119 
00120    return result;
00121 }
00122 
00123 };
